original_text: He also told his grandmother Maakah that she could no longer have authority as the Queen Mother. This was because she had made a disgusting Asherah pole to worship. Asa cut down the Asherah pole and he burned it in the Kidron Valley.
korean_text: 또 그의 어머니 마아가가 혐오스러운 아세라 상을 만들었으므로 태후의 위를 폐하고 그 우상을 찍어 기드론 시냇가에서 불살랐으나

sentences.original_text: He also told his grandmother Maakah
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 또한 그의 할머니 마아가에게 말했다

sentences.original_text: that she could no longer have authority
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀는 더 이상 권위를 가질 수 없다고

sentences.original_text: she had made a disgusting Asherah pole
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀가 혐오스러운 아세라 목상을 만들었기 때문이다

sentences.original_text: Asa cut down the Asherah pole
and he burned it in the Kidron Valley.
